title: SMC Transition Action Policy Schema
description: Defines mandatory executable steps and side effects required upon successful state transitions.

transition_actions.description: Maps source_state__target_state identifiers to required actions.

required_commands.description: List of sovereign commands that MUST be executed (in order) during this transition phase.

resource_updates.description: External resource identifiers or configurations that must be updated.

logging_level.description: The minimum logging level required for this transition execution.
